name: discord-to-txt
description: a chrome extension to extract the whole discord conversation as txt file

scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/icons src/popup/popup.html src/manifest.json dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && mkdir -p dist/content dist/background dist/popup && cp src/content/content.js dist/content/ && cp src/background/background.js dist/background/ && cp src/popup/popup.js dist/popup/
scripts.prepare-icons: convert -size 16x16 xc:#5865F2 src/icons/icon16.png && convert -size 32x32 xc:#5865F2 src/icons/icon32.png && convert -size 48x48 xc:#5865F2 src/icons/icon48.png && convert -size 128x128 xc:#5865F2 src/icons/icon128.png
